lines.text: Kakarot, you raised this Saiyan too much like an Earthling!
I raised him to know the difference between good and evil, unlike some people!
I know the difference, I just don't care! But I used to!
You think I resemble Kakarot? Well, of course... we're both lower-class warriors and there's only a few types like us.
Dad, you caught me... There was a big monkey, and he started smashing into things...

[to Gohan]
How'd you like to join me kid? We'll travel the universe and destroy a few planets, what do you say? It'll be fun!
Kakarot, you are a disgrace to your people. Thousands of years of evolution and you cast it aside for a multitude of weaklings!
I'll be better from now on, mom. Promise.
Good, because we need a lawyer in the family, Gohan, in case you Z-Fighters are fined for property damage!
Come on, I can totally help Gohan with his school work.
That's exactly what I'm afraid of!
Wait, I forgot to call Bulma!
I... I don't know any Kakarot. That's... not my name!
Don't you lie to me!
My name's Goku! Goku!
Then, die here, fool!
[blasts Goku]
Goku, you have to keep fighting! Get up!
Please, you're our only hope!
Piccolo... Yamcha... I feel too weak... I can't even move...
Please, Goku... Remember us, we're your friends!
We're with you, Goku...
Kakarot, you're a strong fighter and if you want my forgiveness kneel down before me and and I will welcome you and you're son as my comrades.
I told you, that my name is Goku!
Enough, and let me warn you do not challenge me because I know where the fruit from the Tree of Might is. Heh heh heh. The difference between our powers is as different as Heaven and Earth!
Is that your way of saying you don't like to lose?
Beg for forgiveness! And if your lucky, I might spare your worthless life.
No, I made a promise to Gohan, I will beat you!
You fool, Kakarot.
Listen, my name is Goku!
You ingrate! Die!
[Turles blasts Goku in the back with several energy blasts]

[to Piccolo]
Who the hell are you?
Why don't you put your money where your mouth is!
The first thing is to wipe out this filthy planet.
Don't worry. From what I've seen, that won't be very difficult.
Yes. You men focus on that. Leave the weak excuse of a Saiyan to me.
You put this tree on our planet... but you never asked.
Personally, I think it makes the forest look better. It can stand as the lone pillar of strength on this planet.
He is a Saiyan. Saiyans never perish. They just skewer!
C'mon! Is that the best you can do? You're amusing me! Don't give up yet!
Kaio Ken... times ten!
